extracted_playbook.title: Avoid Using Untrusted Hyperlinks
extracted_playbook.description: Do not use hyperlinks provided by untrusted third parties to access the SIMA² System Diagnostics Manager. This includes hyperlinks from emails, social media, messaging services, webpages with comments, and QR codes.

extracted_playbook.title: Implement External Web Application Firewall (WAF)
extracted_playbook.description: Use an external Web Application Firewall (WAF) to mitigate attacks using reflected cross-site scripting.
